page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: Schools attended by the adults and children of our area. ADULTS As we have discovered before, many of the people who live in Pelsall in 1985 have moved to the village from the surrounding districts.(See POPULATION -page 1)This fact is shown by people living in our area.Nearly every school and many which are no longer existence were attended by the adults. As expected when looking at the children living in Pelsall NOW we found that the great majority attended the nearest schools which are our school- Pelsall Junior -the neighbouring Pelsall Infants and Pelsall Comprehensive.There are though quite a number of children who each morning go out of Pelsall for their education.
